text: [Onon, ki cunin podose dorand, hamon] tavʙakunandagon, parastisgaron, siposguzoron, ruzadoron, ruku'kunandagon, sacdakunandagon, vodorandagon ʙa korhoi pisandida va ʙozdorandagon az korhoi nopisand va posdoroni hudud [va ahkomi] ilohi hastand. Va on mu'minonero, [ki cunin hastand, ʙa ʙihist] ʙasorat ʙideh
